name: Custom TLC Doll
description:
This is a listing for a Custom Waldorf Inspired doll in the size you choose.
This is a deposit, the balance plus shipping is due upon completion of your doll. 
****Custom Doll Pricing**** Custom prices for 2013
6 inch $70
8 inch Baby $80
10 inch $120
12 inch $140
12 inch Baby $150
15 inch $170

This is the base price if you choose more expensive hair yarns or clothing there will be an additional cost. The deposit is 50%, Deposits are not refundable.
Once your doll is finished I will add a reserved listing with pictures of your doll for the remaining balance plus shipping. 
I use all natural materials 
The skin is cotton tricot in your choice of fair,beige,  peach, tan, sunkissed, cocoa or brown. 
Your doll will be stuffed using 100% clean, carded sheep's wool. 
The eyes and mouth are hand embroidered using cotton embroidery floss in your choice of colors. 
For the hair you can choose from wool, mohair, bamboo, a combination, straight curly, wool, mohair, bamboo, with art yarns, or a combination. You can choose a crocheted cap or the hair sewn on. The possibilities are endless when it comes to the hair. However, some art yarns are expensive and can cost more.
Your doll will come wearing underpants and a dress or top & pants.

Deposits are not refundable

Please contact me with your choices at  tlc.designs@rocketmail.com

**** SHIPPING**** 
I SHIP INSURED PRIORITY MAIL

***International shipping***  
Shipping costs vary by country
